name: Speed is Key (Optimal Games)
description:
If you enjoyed the demo, please wishlist the game on Steam! and join the Optimal Games discord!

Speed is Key is a tough, fast-paced precision platformer where, well... speed is key.

Play as a robot... cyborg... whatever, who has woken up in a test capsule. Upon being freed, you are tested by a TV with a face on it. Tested on what, exactly? How fast you can dodge, how fast you can kill, and how fast you can go. After all... speed is key.

The controls are easy to learn, but hard to master. The only thing you need to know is that you can move left and right, you can jump, and you can wall jump. Simple... right?

  • Story-driven single player platformer where a T.V tests you on how fast you can avoid hazards (both environmental and man-made... or is it man-made?)
  • Around 300 levels, with new mechanics occasionally thrown in to mix things up
  • Beautiful pixel art graphics
  • Boss fights, each with their own, unique mechanic
  • Level editor with Steam Workshop support (or at least that's what is planned)
  • An awesome OST composed by Oliver Stones
  • Multiple endings, which change depending on how fast you go
  • Lots of secrets and easter eggs to discover...
